Run I Top Studies

page.enlisting:
• Observed in 1995 in first ~70 pb-1 of Run I data. • Final Run I top analyses based on ~110 pb-1. – Production cross sections in many channels – Mass: 174.3  5.1 GeV (CDF/DØ combined) – Event kinematics – W helicity, limits on single top production.. • overall consistency with the Standard Model. • but only ~100 top candidates → analyses statistics-limited. • Observed in 1995 in first ~70 pb-1 of Run I data. • Final Run I top analyses based on ~110 pb-1. – Production cross sections in many channels – Mass: 174.3  5.1 GeV (CDF/DØ combined) – Event kinematics – W helicity, limits on single top production..

page.enlisting:
• Top decays before it can hadronize, because width Γt = 1.4 GeV > ΛQCD. – Decay products preserve information about the – Unique opportunity to study the weak interactions of a bare quark, with a mass at the natural electroweak scale! • SM Prediction: – W helicity in top decays is fixed by Mtop, MW, and V-A – W helicity reflected in kinematics: W lepton pt,… • Top decays before it can hadronize, because
